data.name: StressLevelAssessment
data.value:
Rate your stress level on a scale from 1 to 10.
9-10 ‚Äî I lose control of my emotions, unable to do anything.
6-8 ‚Äî I'm very worried, it's difficult to do things because of stress, you need to do something about it.
1-5 ‚Äî mostly fine, I can cope with unpleasant feelings and thoughts.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound
data.value:
You're under a lot of stress right now. We need to come to our senses.
Do two exercises. They are created for this situation üëá

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_1
data.value:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Put your palm on your stomach.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Make sure that the palm moves when inhaling and exhaling.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Breathe slowly for 45 seconds.
Start when you're ready üëá

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_3
data.value:
Excellent. Your breathing should have slowed down and become deeper.
If not, start breathing slower.
Go to the second exercise üëá

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_4
data.value:
At first glance, the exercise looks childish, but it works great.
While you're doing it, you'll come to your senses.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_5
data.value: Find any five objects with your eyes. Name them out loud or to yourself.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_6
data.value: Touch any four objects. Name them out loud or to yourself.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_7
data.value: Hear any three sounds. Name them out loud or to yourself.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_8
data.value:
Pay attention to two sensations in your body (ear itches, leg is numb, thirsty).
List them out loud or to yourself.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_9
data.value:
Remember one of your qualities that you like.
Say it out loud or say it to yourself.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_10
data.value:
Excellent. We have done basic techniques to recover.
The tension should have been reduced.
Let's check it out.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound
data.value:
You're still on edge.
Let's take a different approach. Let's make another technique.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound_Step_1
data.value:
1Ô∏è‚É£ At the same time, he wrinkled his forehead very much, wrinkled his nose, pulled his lips forward.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Hold a strong tension for five seconds.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Then slowly relax your face.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound_Step_2
data.value:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Raise your shoulders as high as possible. Feel the tension in your neck.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Hard, almost to the point of pain, clench your fists.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Hold the tension for five seconds.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Then slowly relax your shoulders and arms.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound_Step_3
data.value:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Strongly bring your elbows behind your back, almost to the point of pain in your shoulder blades.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Hold the voltage for 5 seconds.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Then slowly relax your back.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound_Step_4
data.value:
1. Stretch your toes very much towards yourself.
2. Hold the voltage for 5 seconds.
3. Then slowly relax your legs.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound_Step_5
data.value:
Now take a deep breath. I felt my muscles relax.
If there is still tension left, you can repeat this technique.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound_Step_6
data.value: Let's check how your condition has changed.

data.name: HighStressLvl_SecondRound_Finish
data.value:
It happens.
Let's take a break and do it again.
Get distracted, drink some water, go out to another place, talk to someone if possible.
After that, go back to the technicians. They work.

data.name: HighStressLvl_EndOfExercises
data.value: When you're ready, come back!

data.name: Transition_FromHighToMediumLevel
data.value:
We are glad that it has become easier for you.
If there are urgent matters, you can take care of them.
If you want to feel even calmer, we can continue.

data.name: Transition_FromHighToWeakevel
data.value:
We are glad that it has become easier for you.
If there are urgent matters, you can take care of them.
If you want to feel even calmer, we can continue.

data.name: EndOfAssistance
data.value:
Glad you helped.
If there is someone who also needs support, send him a link to our bot.
We're here if anything. Launch the bot when you need it.

data.name: MediumStressLvl
data.value:
We sympathize. It's not easy for you right now.
Let's do three exercises together to reduce the level of tension.
To do this, follow our instructions.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_1
data.value:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Sit or stand comfortably.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Feel the floor or the ground under your feet.
3. Focus on the feeling of solid support under your feet.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Inhale through your nose. Pay attention to how the air fills the lungs.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Imagine that you exhale air through your heels into the ground.
6Ô∏è‚É£ Repeat inhaling through your nose and exhaling through your heels 7 times.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_2
data.value:
Now you feel the support.
Let's take the next step.
Count backwards from 30 to 1 out loud or to yourself.
Clearly pronouncing each number.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_3
data.value:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Hug yourself very tightly with both hands on your shoulders.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Count to ten and let go.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Relax your fingers. And squeeze your shoulders very tightly again.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Count to ten and let go.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_4
data.value:
Great! After these three exercises, the stress level should decrease slightly.
At the same time, negative thoughts and feelings may return. It's important to notice them, but not let them capture you.
Shall we practice doing this?

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_5
data.value:
This technique will help you see your emotion and let it go.
1Ô∏è‚É£ Think about what negative emotion do you feel? Name her.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_6
data.value:
2Ô∏è‚É£ Feel where it is in your body? You may feel something similar to tension, heaviness, burning.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Put your hand on this place.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_7
data.value:
4Ô∏è‚É£ Direct the breath to this place. In your imagination, surround this emotion with air.
5Ô∏è‚É£ Let her be in an air bubble where she can't hurt you.
6Ô∏è‚É£ Exhale.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_8
data.value:
Good. By this point, your feeling of stress should have decreased.
Is it so?

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_9
data.value:
We are glad that it has become easier for you.
If there are urgent matters, you can take care of them.
If you want to feel even calmer, we can repeat the exercises.
Or you can get acquainted with the principles of maintaining your condition in the norm.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Principles
data.value:
We invite you to get acquainted with six principles that help you stay normal in difficult conditions.
For each principle, you will find a recommendation on how to use it.
Different principles suit different people. Choose the ones that are easier for you to perform.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Principles_1
data.value:
üîé The main principle. Pay attention to your condition.
It is important to know: stress is a natural reaction of the body in response to any adverse effect.
If you know that you are experiencing stress, you can manage it.
How to do it?
‚ö° When you feel tension, take a break from business and pay attention to your feelings.
Name the emotion you're experiencing right now.
üîé Perhaps this emotion manifests itself in the body. Where? Think about what muscles are tense now: neck, back, face?
Awareness alone is enough to trigger mechanisms that reduce stress levels.
If you want, you can massage and relax tense muscles.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Principles_2
data.value:
üßçThe second principle. Take care of your body.
The better your physical condition, the easier it is for you to cope with stress.
Try to fully eat, drink, sleep, rest, move - as much as possible.
The body itself will help the psyche to stay normal.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Principles_3
data.value:
üóìÔ∏è The third principle. Rely on habits.
Find habitual actions that you can perform regularly, even if everything around you is changing.
For example: drink from the same mug every day, make your bed, exercise, keep a diary.
This will help to keep the psyche in a working state.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Principles_4
data.value:
üôè The fourth principle. Do good deeds.
Every good deed increases your own resource. It works on a physiological level.
Even the simplest actions are effective: say nice words to someone, make a gift to your loved ones, help your neighbor.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Principles_5
data.value:
ü§ù The fifth principle. Communicate with other people.
Communication is necessary for a person to maintain mental health. You can talk or just be around someone.
Speak out, support others, just talk about any topic.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Principles_6
data.value:
üß† The sixth principle. Observe the psycho hygiene.
1Ô∏è‚É£ Set aside time when to check news sources and social networks.
‚ùó important - not immediately after waking up and not before going to bed.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Don't get into arguments. Most often, it's useless - it will only increase your stress level.
It's OK to say, "Stop. I'm not discussing it."

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Step_10
data.value:
Good.
Now you know the basic principles.
There will be more exercises and techniques here ‚Äî we will write to you when we add them.
If the stress level is more than 1-5, go to other sections of the bot by pressing the Start button in the Menu (next to the text input field).
There are exercises that will help you recover here and now.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_RepeatExercises
data.value:
We sympathize that the tension persists.
Maybe you need more time for the exercises to work.
Let's do them again, very slowly. They work.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_NotNow
data.value:
Good. Perhaps switching will help you now: drink water, go to another place, talk to someone.
We'll be here when you need us.

data.name: MediumStressLvl_Repeat
data.value:
We sympathize that the tension persists.
Maybe you need more time for the exercises to work.
Let's do them again, very slowly. They work.

data.name: WeakStressLvl
data.value:
At this level of stress, emergency measures are usually not required.
‚ÑπÔ∏è We invite you to get acquainted with the principles that help you stay normal in difficult conditions.
‚ñ∂Ô∏è If you feel tension and want to reduce it right now, go to the exercises.

data.name: WeakStressLvl_Step_1
data.value:
Good.
Let's do three short techniques together.
To do this, follow the instructions.

data.name: Interaction_Description
data.value:
Hello!
We are professional psychologists. We have been working in crisis situations for many years.
We know which techniques are effective.
We will help you to gather strength and cope with stress.
Tell us what situation you are in, and we will offer techniques suitable for you.
Click the "Next" button and answer a few questionsüëá You can also call the operator by clicking the appropriate button.

data.name: HighStressLvl_FirstRound_Step_2
data.value: there should be a timer here

data.name: Interaction_ContactDetails
data.value:
Leave your contact details so that we can contact you.
Choose a convenient way of communication for youüëá
